#| label: fig-pie-exploded
#| fig-cap: "A pie chart with exploded slices"

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

labels = ['Apples', 'Bananas', 'Cherries', 'Dates']
sizes = [30, 25, 20, 25]

# Amount to offset each slice
explode = (0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.pie(
    sizes,
    labels=labels,
    explode=explode,
    autopct='%1.1f%%',
    startangle=90,
    shadow=True
)
ax.axis('equal')  # Keep it circular

plt.show()
